title: 9. Why Fridays May Be Dangerous for Your Health
description: When researchers analyzed which day of the week most drug-safety alerts are released — and what it means for public health — they were stunned. So was Bapu Jena. He talks with them and a physician this week about the “Friday Effect,” a common problem with big repercussions for the safety of the medications.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
